Row.Text: [COLOR_CYAN]* National Wonder (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+50% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this City. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built an Opera House in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.
